tweet_text:
Bitcoin is traceable.

Cash is not.
DeFi taking over.

There's been a lot of misinformation regarding potential cascading effects from BNB liquidation on @VenusProtocol , which have "allegedly" prompted @binance to market dump #BTC to defend #BNB price.

This threadis to explore the fundamental soundness of such allegations.

#FUD

4 ... years ago, we were thrilled to see #BTC finally climb back to $10,000 again. And then it dropped for a bit. I got a few "comments" for the tweet below , for a while... 

Zoom out.

Self custody wallets are not without risks.

I am supportive of self custody, IF you know what you are doing.

Stay #SAFU!

The scammers are so good now they generate addresses with the same starting and ending letters, which is what most people check…

tweet_text:
On this 8th birthday of #Ethereum, a little throw back to May 2, 2015, in Tokyo, just before #ETH was officially born. 

@VitalikButerin stayed in my apartment in Tokyo during this trip. He was already working on and talking about ETH non-stop. And I still missed (didn't buy)…

Happy Birthday #Ethereum! @VitalikButerin 

Among many things, Ethereum made ICOs possible, which in turn, made many other projects possible, including Binance.

Q2 BNB Chain report:

"BNB Chain Dominates Q2 with an average market share of 46.5% for total Verified Smart Contracts, Ethereum Follows at 31.3%"

Keep building.
Bitcoin is more stable than stable coins now…
They say usually, faster is better.
repost_text:
Using your feedback, #Binance has now reduced the min. number of blocks for crediting of deposits on the Ethereum, Arbitrum & Optimism networks.

ETH:
 12 to 6 blocks
 Times down from ~25 mins to ~13 mins

ARB & OP:
 100 to 1 block
 Times down from ~7 mins to ~1 min
